languages.text: {n}Вокс щелкает — на канале звучит голос Хейнрикса.{/n} "{name}, нам так и не удалось поговорить о природе моей миссии, с которой я был приставлен к вашей свите. Время упущено, поэтому я буду краток: я должен присуствовать при вашем спуске на планету. Полагаю, то "приветствие", которое мы получили с Кьявы Гамма, развеяло ваши сомнения в том, что на планете творится нечто, требующее моего пристального внимания".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вокс щелкает — на канале звучит голос Хейнрикса.{/n} "{name}, нам так и не удалось поговорить о природе моей миссии, с которой я был приставлен к вашей свите. Время упущено, поэтому я буду краток: я должен присуствовать при вашем спуске на планету. Полагаю, то "приветствие", которое мы получили с Кьявы Гамма, развеяло ваши сомнения в том, что на планете творится нечто, требующее моего пристального внимания".

languages.text: {n}The vox clicks as Heinrix joins the channel.{/n} "{name}, we haven't managed to discuss the nature of my mission. I was assigned to your entourage for a reason. Time is running out, so I will be brief: I must be present during your expedition to the planet. I trust the 'greeting' we received from Kiava Gamma has dispelled your doubts about whether the events on the planet require my scrutiny."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс щелкает — на канале звучит голос Хейнрикса.{/n} "{name}, нам так и не удалось поговорить о природе моей миссии, с которой я был приставлен к вашей свите. Время упущено, поэтому я буду краток: я должен присуствовать при вашем спуске на планету. Полагаю, то "приветствие", которое мы получили с Кьявы Гамма, развеяло ваши сомнения в том, что на планете творится нечто, требующее моего пристального внимания".

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox clicks as Heinrix joins the channel.{/n} "{name}, we haven't managed to discuss the nature of our mission. I was assigned to your entourage for a reason. Time is running out, so I will be brief: I must be present during your expedition to the planet. I trust the 'greeting' we received from Kiava Gamma has dispelled your doubts about whether the events on the planet require my closest attention."

Time is running out, so I will be brief: I must be present during your expedition to the planet. I trust the 'greeting' we received from Kiava Gamma has dispelled your doubts about whether the events on the planet require my closest attention."

Time is running out, so I will be brief: I must be present during your expedition to the planet. I trust the 'greeting' we received from Kiava Gamma has dispelled your doubts about whether the events on the planet require my scrutiny."

{n}The vox clicks as Heinrix joins the channel.{/n} "{name}, we haven't managed to discuss the nature of my mission. I was assigned to your entourage for a reason. Time is running out, so I will be brief: I must be present during your expedition to the planet. I trust the 'greeting' we received from Kiava Gamma has dispelled your doubts about whether the events on the planet require my scrutiny."

languages.text: {n}海因里希加入了音阵频道，音阵系统发出了咔哒声。{/n}“我一直都没找到机会和你谈谈我的职责具体包括哪些事情，{name}。我之所以加入你的舰队，是有原因的。既然时间不多，我就长话短说吧。如果你打算前往这颗行星，那我也必须同行。至于基亚瓦伽马星上发生的事件是否需要我的调查，对于这个问题，相信我们收到的‘问候’已经打消了你的疑虑。”
languages.original_text: {n}The vox clicks as Heinrix joins the channel.{/n} "{name}, we haven't managed to discuss the nature of my mission. I was assigned to your entourage for a reason. Time is running out, so I will be brief: I must be present during your expedition to the planet. I trust the 'greeting' we received from Kiava Gamma has dispelled your doubts about whether the events on the planet require my scrutiny."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希加入了音阵频道，音阵系统发出了咔哒声。{/n}“我一直都没找到机会和你谈谈我的职责具体包括哪些事情，{name}。我之所以加入你的舰队，是有原因的。既然时间不多，我就长话短说吧。如果你打算前往这颗行星，那我也必须同行。至于基亚瓦伽马星上发生的事件是否需要我的调查，对于这个问题，相信我们收到的‘问候’已经打消了你的疑虑。”

languages.text: {n}El voco chasquea cuando Heinrix se une al canal.{/n} «{name}, todavía no hemos tenido tiempo de hablar de la naturaleza de mi misión. Me asignaron a su séquito por un motivo. El tiempo corre así que seré breve: debo estar presente en su expedición al planeta. Espero que la "bienvenida" que hemos recibido por parte de Kiava Gamma disipe sus dudas sobre si los sucesos del planeta requieren mi supervisión».
languages.original_text: {n}The vox clicks as Heinrix joins the channel.{/n} "{name}, we haven't managed to discuss the nature of my mission. I was assigned to your entourage for a reason. Time is running out, so I will be brief: I must be present during your expedition to the planet. I trust the 'greeting' we received from Kiava Gamma has dispelled your doubts about whether the events on the planet require my scrutiny."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco chasquea cuando Heinrix se une al canal.{/n} «{name}, todavía no hemos tenido tiempo de hablar de la naturaleza de mi misión. Me asignaron a su séquito por un motivo. El tiempo corre así que seré breve: debo estar presente en su expedición al planeta. Espero que la "bienvenida" que hemos recibido por parte de Kiava Gamma disipe sus dudas sobre si los sucesos del planeta requieren mi supervisión».

languages.text: {n}Das Vox-Gerät klickt, als Heinrix sich in den Kanal einschaltet.{/n} "{name}, wir haben es nicht geschafft, die Art meiner Mission zu besprechen. Ich wurde nicht ohne Grund Ihrem Gefolge zugeteilt. Die Zeit ist knapp, also werde ich mich kurz fassen: Ich muss während Ihrer Expedition auf den Planeten anwesend sein. Ich vertraue darauf, dass die 'Begrüßung', die wir von Kiava Gamma erhalten haben, Ihre Zweifel darüber zerstreut hat, ob die Ereignisse auf dem Planeten meine Aufmerksamkeit erfordern."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox clicks as Heinrix joins the channel.{/n} "{name}, we haven't managed to discuss the nature of my mission. I was assigned to your entourage for a reason. Time is running out, so I will be brief: I must be present during your expedition to the planet. I trust the 'greeting' we received from Kiava Gamma has dispelled your doubts about whether the events on the planet require my scrutiny."

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox clicks as Heinrix joins the channel.{/n} "{name}, we haven't managed to discuss the nature of my mission. I was assigned to your entourage for a reason. Time is running out, so I will be brief: I must be present during your expedition to the planet. I trust the 'greeting' we received from Kiava Gamma has dispelled your doubts about whether the events on the planet require my scrutiny."

languages.text: {n}Le vox émet un clic au moment où Heinrix rejoint le canal.{/n} « {name}, nous n'avons pas eu l'occasion d'évoquer la nature de ma mission. J'ai été affecté à votre entourage pour une bonne raison. Le temps presse, alors je serai bref : je dois participer à l'expédition que vous comptez dépêcher sur la planète. Les "salutations" de Kiava Gamma ont certainement dissipé vos doutes. Il est impératif que je sois présent pour enquêter sur les événements survenus sur cette planète. »
languages.original_text: {n}The vox clicks as Heinrix joins the channel.{/n} "{name}, we haven't managed to discuss the nature of my mission. I was assigned to your entourage for a reason. Time is running out, so I will be brief: I must be present during your expedition to the planet. I trust the 'greeting' we received from Kiava Gamma has dispelled your doubts about whether the events on the planet require my scrutiny."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox émet un clic au moment où Heinrix rejoint le canal.{/n} « {name}, nous n'avons pas eu l'occasion d'évoquer la nature de ma mission. J'ai été affecté à votre entourage pour une bonne raison. Le temps presse, alors je serai bref : je dois participer à l'expédition que vous comptez dépêcher sur la planète. Les "salutations" de Kiava Gamma ont certainement dissipé vos doutes. Il est impératif que je sois présent pour enquêter sur les événements survenus sur cette planète. »

languages.text: {n}ヴォクスがカチリと鳴って、ハインリックスがチャンネルに参加する。{/n}「{name}、俺の任務の内容について話し合う機会がなかったな。あなたのお付きに任命されたのには理由がある。時間がないから手短に話そう。惑星を探索するのなら、俺も同行しなければならない。キアヴァ・ガンマから届いた『ご挨拶』で、惑星で起きることが俺の厳しい審査を受ける必要が本当にあるのか、そんなあなたの疑問を払拭したと信じてるよ」
languages.original_text: {n}The vox clicks as Heinrix joins the channel.{/n} "{name}, we haven't managed to discuss the nature of my mission. I was assigned to your entourage for a reason. Time is running out, so I will be brief: I must be present during your expedition to the planet. I trust the 'greeting' we received from Kiava Gamma has dispelled your doubts about whether the events on the planet require my scrutiny."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクスがカチリと鳴って、ハインリックスがチャンネルに参加する。{/n}「{name}、俺の任務の内容について話し合う機会がなかったな。あなたのお付きに任命されたのには理由がある。時間がないから手短に話そう。惑星を探索するのなら、俺も同行しなければならない。キアヴァ・ガンマから届いた『ご挨拶』で、惑星で起きることが俺の厳しい審査を受ける必要が本当にあるのか、そんなあなたの疑問を払拭したと信じてるよ」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in kanala dâhil olmasıyla voks tıkırdıyor.{/n} "{name}, görevimin tabiatını konuşma fırsatımız daha önce olmadı. Ekibinde bulunuyor oluşumun bir sebebi var. Zamanımız az, o yüzden özet geçeceğim: Gezegendeki keşif seferinde ben de ekibinde bulunmalıyım. Kiava Gama'dan aldığımız 'selamlama', gezegende yaşanan olaylar konusunda benim tetkikime ihtiyaç duyulup duyulmadığına dair her türlü şüpheni bertaraf etmiş olmalı."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox clicks as Heinrix joins the channel.{/n} "{name}, we haven't managed to discuss the nature of my mission. I was assigned to your entourage for a reason. Time is running out, so I will be brief: I must be present during your expedition to the planet. I trust the 'greeting' we received from Kiava Gamma has dispelled your doubts about whether the events on the planet require my scrutiny."
